ShortDescription.Value: This Pack adds 6 train variations, consisting of different lengths

Publish.LongDescription:
## Train Variation Asset Pack This Pack adds 6 train variations in different lengths, including a double train. All variations exist for EU and NA themed train.
## New Assets - Passenger Train (3 Segment) (cap. 240) - Passenger Train (4 Segment) (cap. 360) - Passenger Train (5 Segment) (cap. 480) - Passenger Train (6 Segment) (cap. 600) - Passenger Train (7 Segment) (cap. 720) - Passenger Train (8 Segment, Vanilla) (cap. 840) - Passenger Train (2x3 Segments) (cap. 480)
